text: int main ( ) { int n , i , j , k , sum1 , sum2 , lines , * array [ 100 ] ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( i = 1 ; i <= n ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & lines ) ; for ( j = 0 ; j < lines ; j ++ ) { array [ j ] = ( int * ) malloc ( ( j + 1 ) * sizeof ( int ) ) ; for ( k = 0 ; k < j + 1 ; k ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & array [ j ] [ k ] ) ; } } for ( j = lines - 2 ; j >= 0 ; j -- ) { for ( k = 0 ; k <= j + 1 ; k ++ ) { if ( ( sum1 = ( array [ j ] [ k ] + array [ j + 1 ] [ k ] ) ) > ( sum2 = ( array [ j ] [ k ] + array [ j + 1 ] [ k + 1 ] ) ) ) array [ j ] [ k ] = sum1 ; else array [ j ] [ k ] = sum2 ; } } printf ( "%d\n" , array [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ) ; } return 0 ; }
